DOC.brief_title: The ACTIVE ( Use Assurant® Cobalt Iliac Stent System Treatment Iliac Vessel Disease ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study conduct collect 9 month safety efficacy data Assurant Cobalt Iliac Stent subject enrol study .
DOC.criteria: The lesion ( ) either de novo restenotic nature , locate common iliac artery and/or external iliac artery ; The subject symptomatic ( Fontaine stage II III ) target lesion stenosis ≥ 50 % . The target vessel ( ) reference diameter ≥ 6 mm ≤ 10 mm visual estimate ; The lesion length < 100 mm ( 10 cm ) Excessive peripheral vascular disease ( PVD ) , unresolved fresh thrombus tortuousity , heavily calcify . Tissue loss target extremity . The target lesion prosthetic vascular bypass graft within 1 cm graft anastomosis ; The target lesion aneurysm associate aneurysm vessel segment either proximal distal target lesion . The lesion require treatment percutaneous transluminal angioplasty ( PTA ) prior stent placement ; Other lesion require treatment surgery within 30 day procedure ( pre post ) exception nontarget lesion ( ) . Inadequate distal runoff . History bleed diatheses coagulopathy refuse blood transfusion ; Creatinine > 2.5 mg/dl Platelet count < 80,000 cells/mm3 > 700,000 cells/mm3 , white blood cell ( WBC ) < 3,000 cells/mm3 Participation another investigational device drug study complete primary endpoint ( ) clinically interfere study endpoint ; Previously enrol Study .
